description: Contains a recipe for installing PhpPgAdmin

recipes.phppgadmin: Install phppgadmin and configure a virtual host for it.

maintainer: Arne Brasseur - Ren Dao Solutions, bvba
name: phpgadmin
long_description:
Description
====

Chef cookbook that installs PhpPgAdmin. At the moment very basic and only tested with Ubuntu 12.04 + nginx.

Requirements
============

## Platforms
* Debian, Ubuntu

Tested on:

* Debian 7.0 Wheezy
* Ubuntu 12.04


Attributes
==========
